trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 変換、 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>オブジェクトとその他の種類の間です。

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: MouseGestureConverter クラスは、 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> <xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>との間</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>のインスタンスのみに変換します。

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: MouseGestureConverter とを変換、<xref:System.String>修飾子キーとマウス操作の間の区切り記号として「+」文字を使用します</xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、文字列`Control+RightClick`<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture><xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>プロパティを等しく<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>と<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>プロパティを等しく<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>に変換されます

trans-unit.target: インスタンスに指定した型のオブジェクトを変換できるかどうかを判断<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>、指定したコンテキストを使用します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>とを変換、<xref:System.String>修飾子キーとマウス操作の間の区切り記号として「+」キーを使用します</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、文字列`Control+RightClick`<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture><xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>プロパティを等しく<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>と<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>プロパティを等しく<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>に変換されます

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> converts to the string `Control+RightClick`.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>で、<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>プロパティを等しく<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>と<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>プロパティを等しく<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>、文字列に変換します`Control+RightClick`</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>。
